languages.text: "Нам удалось узнать, что энергетическое ядро станции все еще активно, однако множество блоков обесточено, а некоторые полностью разгерметизированы. Признаки биологической активности в основном отмечены в главном отсеке — значит, станция не заброшена. Вопрос в том, почему герольды их милости навигаторов нас игнорируют".

traits.locale_text: "Нам удалось узнать, что энергетическое ядро станции все еще активно, однако множесто блоков обесточено, а некоторые полностью разгерметезированы. Признаки биологичекой активности в основном отмечены в главном отсеке — значит, станция не заброшена. Вопрос в том, почему герольды их милости Навигаторов нас игнорируют".

languages.text: "We were able to ascertain that the reactor core of the station is still active, but many compartments are unpowered and some fully depressurised. The signs of biological activity are largely present in the central module, which means the station has not been abandoned. So, the question remains, why are the esteemed Navigators' heralds ignoring us?"
languages.original_text: "Нам удалось узнать, что энергетическое ядро станции все еще активно, однако множество блоков обесточено, а некоторые полностью разгерметизированы. Признаки биологической активности в основном отмечены в главном отсеке — значит, станция не заброшена. Вопрос в том, почему герольды их милости навигаторов нас игнорируют".

traits.locale_text: "We were able to learn that the reactor core of the station is still active, but many compartments are unpowered and some are fully depressurized. The signs of biological activity are largely present in the central module, which means the station has not been abandoned. The question is, why are the esteemed Navigators' heralds are ignoring us."

"We were able to learn that the reactor core of the station is still active, but many compartments are unpowered and some are fully depressurized. The signs of biological activity are largely present in the central module, which means the station has not been abandoned. The question is, why are the esteemed Navigators' heralds are ignoring us."

"We were able to ascertain that the reactor core of the station is still active, but many compartments are unpowered and some fully depressurized. The signs of biological activity are largely present in the central module, which means the station has not been abandoned. So, the question remains, why are the esteemed Navigators' heralds ignoring us?"

"We were able to ascertain that the reactor core of the station is still active, but many compartments are unpowered and some fully depressurised. The signs of biological activity are largely present in the central module, which means the station has not been abandoned. So, the question remains, why are the esteemed Navigators' heralds ignoring us?"

"We were able to ascertain that the reactor core of the station is still active, but many compartments are unpowered and some fully depressurised. The signs of biological activity are largely present in the central module, which means the station has not been abandoned. So, the question remains, why are the esteemed Navigators' heralds ignoring us?"

languages.text: « Nous sommes en mesure de confirmer que le réacteur de la station est toujours opérationnel, même si de nombreux compartiments sont privés d'énergie et certains ont subi une dépressurisation totale. Les signes d'activité biologique que nous avons relevés sont principalement regroupés dans le module central, ce qui signifie que les lieux n'ont pas été abandonnés. La question se pose donc plus que jamais : pourquoi les honorables représentants des navigateurs font-ils la sourde oreille ? »
languages.original_text: "We were able to ascertain that the reactor core of the station is still active, but many compartments are unpowered and some fully depressurised. The signs of biological activity are largely present in the central module, which means the station has not been abandoned. So, the question remains, why are the esteemed Navigators' heralds ignoring us?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes en mesure de confirmer que le réacteur de la station est toujours opérationnel, même si de nombreux compartiments sont privés d'énergie et certains ont subi une dépressurisation totale. Les signes d'activité biologique que nous avons relevés sont principalement regroupés dans le module central, ce qui signifie que les lieux n'ont pas été abandonnés. La question se pose donc plus que jamais : pourquoi les honorables représentants des navigateurs font-ils la sourde oreille ? »

languages.text: "Wir konnten verifizieren, dass der Reaktorkern der Station noch aktiv ist, doch viele Module sind ohne Energie, in einigen ist es zu einem vollständigen Druckabfall gekommen. Anzeichen biologischer Aktivität sind primär im Zentralmodul zu sehen, die Station wurde also nicht aufgegeben. Es bleibt die Frage, warum die Herolde der ehrenwerten Navigatoren uns ignorieren."
languages.original_text: "We were able to ascertain that the reactor core of the station is still active, but many compartments are unpowered and some fully depressurised. The signs of biological activity are largely present in the central module, which means the station has not been abandoned. So, the question remains, why are the esteemed Navigators' heralds ignoring us?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir konnten verifizieren, dass der Reaktorkern der Station noch aktiv ist, doch viele Module sind ohne Energie, in einigen ist es zu einem vollständigen Druckabfall gekommen. Anzeichen biologischer Aktivität sind primär im Zentralmodul zu sehen, die Station wurde also nicht aufgegeben. Es bleibt die Frage, warum die Herolde der ehrenwerten Navigatoren uns ignorieren."

languages.text: «Hemos podido confirmar que el núcleo del reactor de la estación sigue activo, pero muchos compartimentos están sin corriente y algunos completamente despresurizados. Hay bastantes indicios de actividad biológica en el módulo central, lo que significa que no han abandonado la estación. Lo que hace que me pregunte por qué los venerables heraldos de los navegantes nos siguen ignorando».
languages.original_text: "We were able to ascertain that the reactor core of the station is still active, but many compartments are unpowered and some fully depressurised. The signs of biological activity are largely present in the central module, which means the station has not been abandoned. So, the question remains, why are the esteemed Navigators' heralds ignoring us?"

traits.locale_text: «Hemos podido confirmar que el núcleo del reactor de la estación sigue activo, pero muchos compartimentos están sin corriente y algunos completamente despresurizados. Hay bastantes indicios de actividad biológica en el módulo central, lo que significa que no han abandonado la estación. Lo que hace que me pregunte por qué los venerables heraldos de los navegantes nos siguen ignorando».

languages.text: “目前我们可以确定，空间站的反应堆核心仍在工作，但许多舱室没有通电，有些舱室已完全减压。生物活动的迹象主要出现在中央舱，这说明空间站并没有被废弃。那么，问题来了，为什么尊敬的导航者传令官对我们视而不见呢？”
languages.original_text: "We were able to ascertain that the reactor core of the station is still active, but many compartments are unpowered and some fully depressurised. The signs of biological activity are largely present in the central module, which means the station has not been abandoned. So, the question remains, why are the esteemed Navigators' heralds ignoring us?"

traits.locale_text: “目前我们可以确定，们能够确定，空间站的反应堆核心仍在工作，但许多舱室没有通电，有些舱室已完全减压。生物活动的迹象主要出现在中央舱，这说明空间站并没有被废弃。那么，问题来了，为什么尊敬的导航者传令官对我们视而不见呢？”

languages.text: 「ステーションのリアクターのコアが稼働していることは確認できましたが、多くの区画に電力が供給されておらず、一部は完全に減圧されています。生物活動の気配は主に中央モジュールで確認できるので、ステーションは捨て去られていないということですね。疑問は残ります。なぜ尊き航宙士の使者は、こちらの呼びかけを無視するのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "We were able to ascertain that the reactor core of the station is still active, but many compartments are unpowered and some fully depressurised. The signs of biological activity are largely present in the central module, which means the station has not been abandoned. So, the question remains, why are the esteemed Navigators' heralds ignoring us?"

traits.locale_text: 「ステーションのリアクターのコアが稼働していることは確認できましたが、多くの区画に電力が供給されておらず、一部は完全に減圧されています。生物活動の気配は主に中央モジュールで確認できるので、ステーションは捨て去られていないということですね。疑問は残ります。なぜ尊き航宙士の使者は、こちらの呼びかけを無視するのでしょう？」

languages.text: "İstasyonun reaktör çekirdeğinin hâlâ aktif olduğunu kesin olarak öğrenmeyi başardık ancak çoğu kompartımana güç gitmiyor ve bazılarının basıncı tamamen düşmüş. Biyolojik aktivite emareleri çoğunlukla merkez modülde mevcut, bu da istasyonun terk edilmediği anlamına geliyor. Bu da akıllara şu soruyu getiriyor: Değerli Rotacıların habercileri bize neden yanıt vermiyor?"
languages.original_text: "We were able to ascertain that the reactor core of the station is still active, but many compartments are unpowered and some fully depressurised. The signs of biological activity are largely present in the central module, which means the station has not been abandoned. So, the question remains, why are the esteemed Navigators' heralds ignoring us?"
